snippet: The Internet -- and particularly, Facebook -- is playing a critical role as the police in Montreal build their case against Luka Rocco Magnotta, who is accused of killing Jun Lin, a Chinese student, before dismembering his body and mailing parts to...
abstract: The Internet -- and particularly, Facebook -- is playing a critical role as the police in Montreal build their case against Luka Rocco Magnotta, who is accused of killing Jun Lin, a Chinese student, before dismembering his body and mailing parts to the offices of political parties.

headline.main: Multiple Facebook Accounts for Suspect in Canadian Killing Case
